content.value:
The house has a particular charm, was built in 1953 and remodeled in 2018. It has two internal patios and a terrace. It is of colonial style, with high ceilings which makes it very fresh. We have shared and private rooms, a television and video area and a rest room.

We are located in the neighborhood of Granada, from which you can walk to any of the tourist interest sites in Cali, such as Iglesia Ermita.

Located in Cali and with Saint's Peter Cathedral reachable within 2 km, Tikay Café- Hostal provides express check-in and check-out, rooms, a bar, free WiFi throughout the property and a shared lounge. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a shared kitchen and currency exchange for guests.
The hotel will provide guests with a fridge, a stovetop, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries, a TV with satellite channels and DVD Player. At Tikay Café- Hostal, each room includes a seating area.
Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Cali, like hiking.

Jorge Isaacs Theater is 2.3 km from Tikay Café- Hostal, while La Ermita Church is 2.4 km away. The nearest airport is Alfonso Bonilla Aragón International, 22 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

description.description: Tikay Cafe Hostal is a comfortable and cozy place, ideal for the traveler's rest, has fully equipped kitchen, TV and video room, outdoor dining room and internal patio also has its own cafe with terrace where you can try different natural juices of tropical fruits and fresh and light meals. We offer airport pick-up and tourist information. It is staffed by its owners.
